lines.text: Who taught you that senseless self-chastisement? I give you the money and you take it! People who can't accept a gift have nothing to give themselves.
Why don't you leave our boy in peace?
I'll strangle him for nine-tenths, and the last tenth will make him strong.
Well, Jacob Willem, then you've been a big ass.
I came to tell you. Today I have been sworn in as a lawyer. You must be sorry but I am sworn in and this is the last time I'll come here. Farewell for ever. You no longer exist for me.
You congratulate me? I can't take your hand. The hand of someone who always opposed me.
